name: vscode-bazel-extension
description: High-performance VSCode extension for Bazel development

scripts.install: npm install && cd bazel-lsp && cargo build --release
scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:extension
scripts.build:rust: cd bazel-lsp && cargo build --release && mkdir -p ../extension/server && cp target/release/bazel-lsp ../extension/server/
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:extension
scripts.package: npm run build && cd extension && vsce package

author: Glean
